amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 117-241 as en bloc: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6, printed in Part A of House Report 117-241.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 207 (Roll no. 42).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
